thread.title: Qantas takes on Alan Chang as country manager for China
thread.title_full: Qantas takes on Alan Chang as country manager for China

author: Hong Kong, August 28, 2015
title: Qantas takes on Alan Chang as country manager for China
text:
Qantas takes on Alan Chang as country manager for China Hong Kong, August 28, 2015 
ALAN Chang has been appointed country manager for Qantas, China, with the responsibility of managing the commercial, financial and operational performances for the company across the Chinese market. He will be based in the companyâ€™s Shanghai office. 

Prior to this role, Chang was the regional sales manager for Emirates in Taiwan. Before that, he served as general manager for Holiday Tours and Travel for five years, representing Qantas and Jetstar as a general sales agent in Taiwan. 

He is also an alumnus of Royal Roads University in Canada and Aletheia University in Taiwan.
